message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate it. However, $110 is a bit more than I'm comfortable spending. I'm willing to pay $105 for the product. What do you think?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $108.
